st: Koi hain jiska ess dil ko intjaar hain..
s:
Koi hain jiska ess dil ko intjaar hain..
Khyalo mein bas usi ka khayal hain..
Khushyaan main saari us par luta du
Chahat me uski mai khud ko mita du
Kab ayega vo jiska es dil ko intjaar h…

st: Life is a journey,
s:
Life is a journey,
Har pal mein pyar hai,
Har lamhe mein khushi hai,
Khoo do to yadein hai,
Jee lo to zindagi hai.

st: मेरे दिल में एक धड़कन तेरी है…
s:
मेरे दिल में एक धड़कन तेरी है…
उस धड़कन कि क़सम तू ज़िन्दगी मेरी है
मेरी एक साँस में एक साँस तेरी है …
वो साँस जो रूक जाये तो मौत मेरी है ..

st: Koi gam de pave parchave na,
s:
Koi gam de pave parchave na,
Koi gam de pave parchave na,
jis nagree yaar vasde ne,
sanu rona de k umraan da, bhaven oh khid khid hasde ne,
Asin mangde haan sukh una da,
jinha jholi hanju paaye ne,
na roko ajj ron devo,
meinu yaar chete aye ne…!!!

st: Meri Zindagi K Raaz Main Ek Raaz Tum Bhi Ho
s:
Meri Zindagi K Raaz Main Ek Raaz Tum Bhi Ho
Meri Bandagi Ki Aas Main Ek Aas Tum Bhi Ho
Tum Kya Ho Mere,
Kuch Ho Bhi Ya Kuch Bhi Nahi”
Magar
Meri Zindagi K Kaash Main Ek Kaash Tum Bhi Ho…!

st: Ek Pyara Sawal Ans Abi Dena
s:
Ek Pyara Sawal Ans Abi Dena
But Truely..
Life Me Mujhe Bhul Jane K Apke Pas 100reason Honge,
But Muje Yaad Rkhne Ka 1reason Hoga Wo Kya H?
Plz Rply.
I M Waiting…

st: Kabhi Zindagi Me Kisi K Liye
s:
Kabhi Zindagi Me Kisi K Liye
Mat Rona..
Kyunki Wo Tumhare
Aansuo Ke Kabil Na Hoga..
Aur Jo In Aansuo K Kabil Hoga..
Wo Tumhe Kabhi Rone Hi Nahi Dega..!!

st: Dil Tuta Mera Kisi K Sath
s:
Dil Tuta Mera Kisi K Sath
Chalte Huye..
Ache The Hum Tanhaeeyon Me
Palte Huye..
Har Baar Pada Zindagi
Ka Tamacha Hume..
Zindagi
Se Yun Sambhalte Huye..

st: Mere Armano Ko Yu Kuchalo Na Tum k,
s:
Mere Armano Ko Yu Kuchalo Na Tum k,
Ki Zindagi Adhuri Reh Jaye Meri,

Dikha De Khuda Is Kadar Karisma koi,
Ki Har Tamanna Poori Ho Jaye Meri..!!

st: Zakham ki baat nahi hai,
s:
Zakham ki baat nahi hai,
jaane dard kyu hota hai,
dhokhe ki baat nhi hai,
jaane ehsaas kyu hota hai,
jante hue ki bewafi hai,
na jane phir bhi pyar kyu hota hai…

st: gir gaya aasmaan se udte hue to kya gum.
s:
gir gaya aasmaan se udte hue to kya gum.

garv hai ki uddan lagayi thi.

vo kya samjhe girne ka dard,

jo ghoslo se kabhi niklte hi nhi…….

st: Pyar to zindagi ka afsana hai,
s:
Pyar to zindagi ka afsana hai,
Iska apna hi ek tarana hai,
Pata hai sab ko milenge sirf aanso,
Phir bhi na jane kyo har koi iska deewana hai..

st: Aaj Kisi ne Humara Dil toda to..
s:
Aaj Kisi ne Humara Dil toda to..
Hum ko yeh ehsas hua..
”
AE DOSTO
”
Jis ka Dil kabhi Humne toda tha,
Woh aaj Na jaane Kis Haal me Hoga.

st: matlabi ladki se acchi to meri
s:
matlabi ladki se acchi to meri
cigrett he
Dosto..II

jo mere honto se apni zindagi
shuru karti he…
aur mere kadmo k niche apna dum tod deti hai…

st: Safar zindagi ka bahut hi hassen hai,
s:
Safar zindagi ka bahut hi hassen hai,
Sabhe ko kisi na kisi ki talash hai,
Kisi ke pas manjil hai to raah nahi,
Aur jiske paas raah h to manjil nahi…

st: Tujhe palko pe bithane ko ji chahta hai,
s:
Tujhe palko pe bithane ko ji chahta hai,
Teri baho se lipatne ko ji chahta hai,
Khubsurti ki intehaa hain tu,
Tuje zindagi me basane ko ji chahta hai…

st: Zindagi me agar bura waqt na aata to,
s:
Zindagi me agar bura waqt na aata to,
Apno mein chupe hue ger aur,
Gero mein chupe hue apne,
Humein kabhi najar nahi aate….

st: Khwaish aise ki aasman tak ja sako,
s:
Khwaish aise ki aasman tak ja sako,
Dua aise ki khuda ko pa sako,
Jine ke liye pal bahut kam hai,
Jiyo aise ke har pal mein,
zindgi pa sako…

st: wo zindgi hi kya jisme mohabt nhi,
s:
wo zindgi hi kya jisme mohabt nhi,
wo mohabt hi kya jisme yadein nhi,
wo yadein kya jisme tm nhi,
aur wo tm hi kya jiske sath hm nhi.

st: Zindgi ke safar ko lafzo mein piroya hai,
s:
Zindgi ke safar ko lafzo mein piroya hai,
Apni har gazal ko dard mein bhigoya hai,
plz aaj wah wah na kehna,
kyun ki aaj fir ye dil kisi ki yaad mein roya hai

st: Zindagi mohtaaz nahi manzilon ki,
s:
Zindagi mohtaaz nahi manzilon ki,
Vakt har manzil dikha deta hai,
Marta nahi koi kisi se juda hoke,
Vakt sabko jeena sikha deta hai.

st: Pyar ko log Mohobbat kehte hain,
s:
Pyar ko log Mohobbat kehte hain,
Kuch log isse bandagi kehte hain,
Magar jis pe hum marte hain,
Unhe hum zindagi kehte hain.

st: Zindgi tanha hai viraan hai,
s:
Zindgi tanha hai viraan hai,
bus yeh hi to meri ek pehchan hai,
sochta hun jab beth kar tanha tab,
lagta hai ki meri zindgi to gamon Ki dukan hai,

st: Gam-e-Zindagi Ke Maare Hain,
s:
Gam-e-Zindagi Ke Maare Hain,
Har Baazi Jeet Ke Haare Hain,
Yeh Jo Meri Jholi Mein Pathar Hain,
Sab Mere Chahne Walon Ne Marey Hain!

st: Zindagi mein kuch baatein sachh hoti hain:
s:
Zindagi mein kuch baatein sachh hoti hain:
ek sachh yeh hai ki main tumse pyaar karti hoon,
ek sachh yeh bhi hai ki yeh sab jaanke bhi tum mujjhe chhod kar chale gaye,
ek sachh yeh bhi hai ki tum bhi mere liye tadapte ho,
aur ek sachh yeh bhi sunlo ki main tumhara meri zindagi mein waapis aane ka aaj tak intezaar karti hoon.

st: Zindagi se sabhi ko mohabat hai,
s:
Zindagi se sabhi ko mohabat hai,
Par Zindagi kisi ki mohabat nahi banti,
Tamanna le kar jeete hai sab log,
Magar har tamanna Taqdeer nahi banti…!!!

st: Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
s:
Khushiyo Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Pyar Ki Mohtaz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Hans Leta Hoo Logo Ko Dikhane Ke Liye,
Warna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai Meri Zindagi…!!

st: Pyar me koi to dil tod deta hai,
s:
Pyar me koi to dil tod deta hai,
Dosti me koi to bharosa tod deta hai,
Zindagi jina to koi gulaab se sikhe,
Jo khud toot kar do dilo ko jod deta hai…!!

st: Meri Zindagi Ek Band Kitab Hai,
s:
Meri Zindagi Ek Band Kitab Hai,
Jise Aaj Tak Kisi Ne Khola Nahi,
Jisne Khola Usne Padha Nahi,
Jisne Padha Wo Samjha Nahi,
Aur Jo Samaj Saka Wo Mila Nahi…!!

st: Zindgi se apna har dard chupa lena,
s:
Zindgi se apna har dard chupa lena,
Khushi na sahi gam gale laga lena,
Koi agar kahe mohabbat aasan hai,
To use mera toota hua dil dikha dena…!!
